name: Vienna Roast
description:
The second darkest of our roasts, this blend has a great body, low acidity and is a favourite choice for coffee drinkers who enjoy a strong cup, with the characteristic bittersweet notes.

  • Contains some of our most-loved and highest scoring coffees.
  • Made using aluminium, that is 100% recyclable. 
  • Keeps freshness and flavour intact. 
  • Easy to use and perfect for quick, fuss-free brewing.
  • These Coffee capsules are compatible with any machine that works with Nespresso®️* Original Line Coffee pods.
  • We recommended using these for a single shot of espresso and espresso-style beverages.  

Tastes great when used in milk-based beverages.

Disclaimer:- Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Nespresso®. Nespresso® is a registered trademark of Societe des Produits Nestlé S.A.
